title: Himi 331
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Sīsū ke ke tuku ‘a e
Folofola ‘ofa,
Ke tafe mālohi ki he
Fonua kātoa.
2.
Ke liliu ia ‘a e kakai
‘Oku angahala,
Pea hao ‘o mo’ui,
Honau laumālie.
3.
Ke hoko ‘o kofu’aki,
‘A ho kakai tui,
‘A ho Laumālie Lelei,
Ke nau mālohi ai.
4.
Pea ke nau mohu lelei,
‘I ho anga’ofa,
Ko e tui mo e ‘ofa,
Mo e fiefia.
5.
Sīsū ke ulo ke lahi
‘A ho ‘ofeina;
Hangē ko e la’ā lelei
‘I he maama ‘o’ou.
6.
Tuku ke nau fakaulo,
‘Enau maama lelei,
Ki he kakai kotoa pē,
Te nau hoko ki ai. *
